word: Beset with temptations without number, we must resist firmly or be conquered. . . . Paul's sanctification was the result of a constant conflict with self. He said: "I die daily" (1 Corinthians 15:31). His will and his desires every day conflicted with duty and the will of God. Instead of following inclination, he did God's will, however crucifying to his own nature. God leads His people on step by step.--Testimonies, vol. 8, pp. 312, 313.
